title: [Minecraft.net|CULTURE] 栩栩如生的城市
author: 问谛居
txt_content:
本帖最后由 问谛居 于 2020-4-4 00:24 编辑 

MINECRAFT BUILDSA Lifelike City
一座栩栩如生的城市
Can you tell if Cubed Community’s ‘Andea’ is real or not?
你能分辨的出Cubed Community的‘Andea’是真是假么？
Jess Robinson 杰丝·鲁宾逊


Thanks to the power of hard work and amazing renders, it’s difficult to believe Andea isn’t an actual city in the real world. The builders of Cubed Community have created a unique metropolis inspired by different cities around the world for this lifelike creation. Taking inspiration from Los Angeles, Toronto, and Barcelona, the team used their talent and creativity to achieve this eye-catching result.
得益于建筑师们尽心竭力的付出与美轮美奂的光色渲染， Andea 几乎能突破虚拟与现实间那层牢不可破的壁垒，让人们误以为它是座真正的城市。Cubed Community 的建造者博采世界各地不同城市之长，自成一体，才创造出了这并世无双的大城市。这个团队从洛杉矶，多伦多和巴塞罗那处汲取灵感，加之以卓绝的才华和惊才绝艳的创造力，方才熔铸成了这一令人看一眼便心驰神往的作品。
【EDsky 译自官网 2020 年 04 月 02 日发布的 A Lifelike City；原作者 Jess Robinson】
【本文排版借助了：SPX】
